forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible this morning with partly cloudy skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning, then variable cloudiness during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 17C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning, then variable cloudiness during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 63F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Thunder possible. Low 12C. SSW winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Thunder possible. Low 53F. SSW winds at 10 to 20 mph, decreasing to less than 5 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 65F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
